definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: I joined him the following Tuesday night.
sentences.chinese: 隔週的禮拜二晚上，我跟他去了。

sentences.english: We have planned to finish the adjustment of the machine before Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 咱們規劃在禮拜二以前完成機器的調試事情。

sentences.english: I felt terrible on Monday and worse on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 禮拜一我感覺很糟糕，禮拜二更差。

sentences.english: She will visit her mother next Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 她下個禮拜二會去探望她的母親。

sentences.english: The President will address the nation on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 禮拜二總統要發表全國講話。

sentences.english: Are you coming to the meeting next Tuesday?
sentences.chinese: 下個禮拜二，你會來參加這個聚會嗎？

sentences.english: He licked his finger and held it into the wind. "Tuesday?"
sentences.chinese: 他舔了舔手指，伸進風裏，“禮拜二？”

sentences.english: Our meeting will be next Tuesday at eight o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 我們的集會將鄙人禮拜二八點鐘進行。

sentences.english: The interview with President Yar'Adua was recorded late on Monday and first broadcast at 0530 GMT on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 總統凡人發言是在禮拜一錄的，首次播出是在禮拜二。

definition: to eat one's fill/to be full
sb who tries to be on good terms with everyone

pinyin: Mei3 li4 jian1 He2 zhong4 guo2

definition: vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
